name: SpiderScape2D
description:
*** PLEASE COMMENT IF YOU LIKE THE GAME! ENJOY!!******

Rescue your balls from the spider web!

How To Play:

You have to rescue your balls (click on them!) in the correct order to finish level.

Start from weakest web, make your way to hardest web.

Webs holding the ball have webs of different strengths (blue:1 , green: 2, red: 3)

Example:

Ball1: Connected with 4 blue webs (strength: 4x1=4)

Ball2: Connected with 3 blue webs , 1 green web (strength: 3x1+1x2=5)

Ball3: Connected with 1 blue web, 2 green webs, 1 red web ( strength 1x1 + 2x2 + 1x3 =8)

You have to follow the clicking order : Ball1, Ball2, Ball3 for the above example.

Have Fun!
